scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:client:prod: cd frontend && npm run build:prod && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:client & npm run build:server
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:client:prod & npm run build:server
scripts.publish:server: cd server && npm run publish && cd ..
scripts.publish:client: cd frontend && npm run publish && cd ..
scripts.publish: npm run publish:server && npm run publish:client
scripts.publish:prod: npm run build:prod && cd build && npm pack && npm publish
